The updated kitchen is equipped with stainless appliances, granite counters and ample cabinet space. The main floor features 3 bedrooms, 1 remodeled bath, eat-in kitchen, formal dining room and large living room with wood burning fireplace. The interior has been freshly painted and the hardwood floors refinished. The lower level has a spacious family room / office and a half bath. There is access here to washer/dryer and a large 1 car plus g

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Camille Ahern - 9259630068 - Investors, Contractors and Project-Seeking Home Buyers...look no further, a prime opportunity for a fixer-upper delight in prestigious Golden Heights awaits. This single family home is perched atop a hill overlooking the neighborhood yet minutes away to Golden Gate Park, UCSF, Sunset Reservoir, Ocean Beach, schools, restaurants and public transportation. A street lined neighborhood where parking is never an issue and a place where you are surrounded by the beauty of charming and eclectic real estate. Optimistic property features include a deep yet spacious attached garage with a 3rd bedroom conversion (Buyers to verify), well lit floor-plan filled with an abundance of natural sunlight, sweeping neighborhood views, sizeable upper level bedrooms and a backyard with tremendous opportunity to cater ones needs. With a little imagination and creativity, a rare to own backyard has the potential to be transformed with mezzanine levels of deck space, sitting areas, raised vegetable beds and so much more! A rare opportunity to own a home in one of San Francisco's well kept secrets where the quality of life, architecture, history and recreational open space/parks is preserved.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow is open with Chicago Title, escrow #: FCLA-3832300019, Officer Caroline Cruz. Bedroom count differs from tax records, we believe previous owner established 3rd bedroom in garage without permits. Buyer to verify. This is a trust sale. Offers if any are due Wed Jan 25th by 2:00 PM.

The lower level has a bonus room that can be used as an office/den, laundry & parking has high ceilings offering the perfect opportunity for expansion. Very desirable location close to tons of Inner Sunset shops and restaurants, UCSF, weekend farmers market, and just a short stroll to Golden Gate Park, JP Murphy Playground and public transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Embrace the serenity and captivating ocean views that define 795 Noriega Street. This stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom, mid-century single-family home offers breathtaking ocean views from every room. Nestled on a fully detached corner lot, this stylish residence boasts unrivaled privacy and tranquility. Entertaining is a delight in this home's expansive, open floor plan featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, creating an abundance of natural light. Whether you prefer to gather by the fireplace or host guests on one of the two private decks with stunning ocean views as your backdrop, this residence offers the perfect setting for unforgettable moments. The kitchen is a chef's dream, complete with a custom island, ample cabinet and counter space, and SS appliances. Enjoy the perfect floor plan with 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms on one level. The primary suite is a true oasis, providing the perfect retreat for relaxation. The spacious suite connects to a massive walk-in closet/dressing room, which can also be utilized as a 4th bedroom. Complete with 2-car side by side garage w/ EV charger, beautiful hardwood floors, and laundry room. Nestled in the heart of Golden Gate Heights. Just steps to Grandview Park & Turtle Hill, minutes to Inner Sunset and Noriega dining and hot spots.
Confidential Remarks: Contact Michael Bellings at Michael@BellingsBrothers.com or 415.238.7405 for offer information or details. Send clients to NoriegaDreamHome.com Book a private showing here: https://calendly.com/bellingsbrothers/795noriega?month=2024-01

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Situated on a beautiful tree-lined street in highly desirable Forest Hill, this stunning 4+ bedroom home offers a flexible, contemporary floor plan ideal for families & those working from home. The main level features an expansive Great Room that sets the tone for this incredible home w/soaring ceilings, hardwood floors, WB FP flanked by striking built-ins & a bank of windows with peaceful outlooks. Directly off the Great Room is a fully equipped, eat-in chef's kitchen w/ Viking Professional appliances, granite countertops, pot-filler faucet, ample cabinet storage and butcher block island. The main level continues w/3 well-scaled BR & 2 full BA - one with limestone finishes. The spacious primary retreat includes a remodeled full bath w/shower stall and hex-tile detail and direct access to the wonderfully private garden with mature plantings. The casual lower level includes a large media room, play area, add'l bedroom & limestone accented full bath + private office/5th BR. The inviting deck & garden are accessed from a side gate or through multiple interior access points. Two car garage + driveway parking. A+ location! Close to Forest Hill Muni, West Portal & Irving St Shops & Cafes
Confidential Remarks: www.479Pacheco.com. Email cecedoricko-re@compass.com for disclosures or showing request. Pre-escrow opened with Joy Fogarty - FirstAm. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 635 Pacheco. Bordering Golden Gate Heights and Forest Hill, this spacious ELEVATOR VIEW home has a lot to offer. Enjoy wonderful northerly views from the living room and just a few steps above is the formal dining area. Beyond the dining area is the large eat in kitchen with island, an abundance of storage, stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting and radiant heated floors. Right off the kitchen enjoy the sunlit rear yard for easy entertaining. Laundry closet, and powder room finish off the main level. The light filled top floor includes a large primary bedroom with ensuite bathroom, walk in closet, and walk out balcony with breathtaking views to the North. 3 more bedrooms and full bath finish off the top floor. There is a bonus room and full bath on the second level that offers flexibility as an office, another bedroom or entertainment space. Large 2 car side by side garage with loft for extra storage. Energy efficient solar panels included. Great location with easy access to 9th Avenue or West Portal restaurant and shops. Public transportation is also just a couple blocks away. Great home.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show. Contact Derrick via text/voice @ 415.806.6188. Pre Escrow with WFG Title - Connie Choy.

Public Remarks: Immerse yourself in luxury with breathtaking views in this stunning, newly remodeled 3-story home perched atop San Francisco's Golden Gate Heights! Unwind and take in panoramic vistas of the Pacific Ocean's vastness, the iconic Sutro Tower, the bustling bay, and even the majestic Golden Gate Bridge on clear days. An open floorplan and rich oak wood floors create a gourmet kitchen perfect for entertaining, complete with brand new cabinets, quartz countertop, top-of-the-line appliances including a Viking gas range stove and dishwasher and Kitchenaid fridge. The top floor boasts 2 spacious bedrooms, each with ensuite bathrooms, while the extra spacious primary suite offers a luxurious retreat with an office nook with incredible views. A third bedroom and bath on the first floor makes for the perfect guest suite. This renovated haven features all-new electrical and plumbing systems for peace of mind. Enjoy two separate living areas - an open floor plan kitchen seamlessly flowing into the dining room and living room, all bathed in the warm glow of recessed lighting and energy-efficient LED features. Expansive new windows further enhance the natural light and stunning views. A one-car garage with a brand new door completes this exceptional property.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Classic Traditional view home tucked away on wonderful tree-lined block, close to JP Murphy Park! Inviting garden entrance leads to an open vestibule & into a gracious foyer w/coat closet. Impressive formal living rm w/recessed lighting boasts a handsome fireplace w/craftsman brick surround, built-in bookshelves, a bank of windows & gleaming hardwood floors. Banquet-size formal dining rm w/large five-panel bay window & striking chandelier, perfect for entertaining! Spacious light-filled kitchen w/sun porch showcases high-end appliances incl a Wolf induction cooktop stove w/huge stainless steel hood, Bosch dishwasher & sep built-in double oven, granite tile counters & spacious breakfast rm w/pantry. Attractive staircase w/picture window ascends to the upper level landing & private living quarters. Enormous master bedroom w/two big closets is adjoined by a great home office or nursery w/skylight & a full bath w/dual vanity sink, cast-iron tub & sep walk-in shower. Two additional good-size bedrooms both have picturesque views to Sutro Tower & Twin Peaks. Other features incl a terrific family rm or 4th BR w/built-in bookshelves, a built-in sauna, wine rm, laundry rm & storage rm. Spectacular park-like landscaped backyard w/large patio, sweeping lawn & mature, colorful plants & trees!
Confidential Remarks: Offer date Thursday, July 25 by 12 Noon. Please use a SFAR Purchase Contract & stipulate that buyer's initial deposit will be in escrow within one (1) business day of acceptance. Escrow opened with WFG National Title Insurance Company, Escrow Officer Katerina Rosignuolo 415-919-9853. Please Email Andrew@AndrewHerrera.com for all showings and/or for a Disclosure Package. (no text).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience luxury living in this beautifully remodeled home at 1847 20th Ave, San Francisco. Completely renovated from the studs, this exquisite residence offers 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms, encompassing 2325 sq ft of contemporary living space. Step inside to find a bright and airy family room, complemented by brand new floors throughout. The chef's kitchen is a culinary delight, featuring high-end appliances and designer cabinets. Modern conveniences include new electrical systems and an EV charging station, as well as a tankless water heater for endless hot water. The home's spacious backyard provides a perfect setting for outdoor entertainment and relaxation. Located close to the bustling Noriega business district, Golden Gate Park, and Stonestown Mall, you'll enjoy easy access to shopping, dining, and recreation. Don't miss out on this exceptional property that seamlessly blends luxury and convenience in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Bright & spacious Golden Gate Heights home featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and abundant overflow living space. The main level boasts a sun-drenched living room with huge windows, and an original fireplace with connected built-ins. Adjacent is a formal dining room leading to a charming kitchen with Southern light, and copious storage & countertop space. In the back of the home, two ample sized bedrooms are connected by an office/playroom with french doors to a balcony and views of Sutro Tower. An updated split bath and deep storage closet complete the main level. Downstairs, a guest bedroom, full bath, and family room open to a deck with access to the garden. The deep, level lot provides space for entertaining and kids and/or pet play area. Additionally, the home is equipped with a huge garage, storage space under the home, solar panels, and a level 2 EV charger outlet in the garage. Excellent location close to the hub of Inner Sunset, Golden Gate Park, and steps to tennis courts, basketball courts, and a playground.
Confidential Remarks: 2,136 SF includes finished lower level, legality is unknown but extremely usable and connected to the upper level. **Supra lockbox - go direct! Pls do not use ShowingTime. OFFERS Thursday 1/25 @ 3pm.

Situated in the fabulous Inner Parkside/GoldenGate Hts neighborhood just minutes to West Portal shopping district and Stonestown Galleria conveniences! Smartly updated throughout with flexible floor plan including semi-open kitchen and dining room with specular ocean views! Dining area joins to bright living room-also with ocean view plus fireplace; A second living /bonus room with fireplace can also be found on the lower level. There are a total of 3 spacious bedrooms, and 3 full bathrooms all updated. The modern kitchen features gourmet stainless appliances, including Bertazzoni stove, as well as custom cabinetry, stone and wood countertops, skylight and side garden window. Flooring is Parquet hardwood throughout, with designer tiles featured on kitchen and baths floors. Additional amenities include high vaulted ceilings, recessed and modern pendent lighting; master bath with whirlpool bathtub, dual shower heads, radiant floor heating, two large closets with custom California Closet organizers, washer/dryer and 2 car garage. Backyard features a spacious cottage with 1 bedroom, living area, and full bathroom! Lovely landscaped yard, mature fruit trees, patio with BBQ, fire-pit, and hot tub! Come See!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Picturesque Golden Gate Heights home with warmth, updated, classic mid-century style, beautiful views of the Pacific from the garden. Elegant living room has a gas fireplace, high ceilings, newly finished hardwood floors, and pretty picture windows. Overlooking the garden, the formal dining room is bright and opens to a large patio. The updated, eat-in kitchen is so spacious and looks out over the garden. Two bedrooms on the main level share a full bath. The primary bedroom has access to the incredible garden. Downstairs, the ideal family room has a bar and lots of space. This level has a large office/den with built-ins for work or study and a full bathroom. This flexible space is wonderful for another bedroom or guests. Two-car garage, workshop, laundry, and space for a kitchenette complete this level. The multi-level garden is private and inviting, with an entertaining area, lovely landscaping, big ocean views. The home is on a charming block of Golden Gate Heights, near Rocky Outcrop Park, Golden Gate Heights Park, Cascade Walk, Murphy playground. Convenient access to nearby neighborhoods like West Portal and the Inner and Outer Sunset's diverse array of restaurants, shops, UCSF, Golden Gate Park. 19th Ave corridor and public transportation options make it easy for commuters.

Remarks: Nestled in coveted Golden Gate Heights, this semi-detached home boasts breathtaking views of the ocean, Mt Tamalpais, Twin Peaks, Golden Gate Bridge, Mount Sutro, and the neighborhood stretching all the way to Marin. Situated just moments from the vibrant 9th & Irving corridor, Golden Gate Heights Park, Grandview Park, JP Murphy Playground, and the iconic 16th Avenue Tiled Steps, this residence offers unparalleled access to local attractions. Step inside to discover an updated kitchen and a spacious living room flowing into a dining room, both adorned with expansive windows showcasing stunning 180-degree views. Just a few steps up to find three bedrooms and two baths, including a primary suite, opening to a rear yard flourishing with vibrant greenery. An interior stairway on the main level seamlessly connects to a two-car side-by-side garage boasting remarkably high ceilings, ideal for adding a mezzanine for additional storage space. Additional huge storage space midway down from main level to garage for additional expansion potential.

An interior stairway on the main level seamlessly connects to a two-car side-by-side garage boasting remarkably high ceilings, ideal for adding a mezzanine for additional storage space. Additional huge storage space midway down from main level to garage for additional expansion potential.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This large and gracious home, lovingly-maintained by its long-term owners, is perched on a prime block in Golden Gate Hts with breathtaking panoramic water views stretching from the East Bay to the Sutro Tower to the Marin Headlands! The views can be enjoyed from both the living room and dining room, where they form a dramatic and unmistakable backdrop. The living room spans the full width of the bldg and feels exceptionally large. It is anchored by a wood-burning fireplace and includes a walk-out balcony. The spacious kitchen features quartz counters, stainless appliances and a breakfast nook with a garden window. The adjacent family room has built-in cabinetry, speakers and desk, and opens to a peaceful walk-out rear patio. A powder room completes the main level. The top floor has 4 BR (rarely-available on the same level). There are 2 baths, one of them ensuite. Both the front & rear BR's include their own balconies, one with sweeping views of the Golden Gate, the other with views of the lush rear yard. The unusually big garage fits 4 cars + laundry + storage. Close to 11th Ave which connects to bustling Irving Street retail district & MUNI. Close to beloved Grandview Park & Golden Gate Park. Exceptionally inviting home in move-in condition, ready for your personal touch!
Confidential Remarks: Offers, if any, welcomed on Wed 5/8 at 12 noon. All offers on SFAR form with cover sheet of disc pkg & pre-app letter / proof of funds. Fabulous views from both levels including from the public rooms (Living / Dining). The 4BR's are all on the same (upper) level. Rarely-available 4-car garage. EZ to show on supra! Disclosure pkg here: https://app.disclosures.io/link/509-Ortega-Street-b3n1jfdv

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: The stunning modern home epitomizes contemporary elegance and sophistication located in the vibrant inner sunset with breathtaking ocean views. A masterpiece of architectural design and down to studs fully remodeled with total 4 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms providing a truly comfort and luxury living space. As step into this remarkable home, you will notice the sophisticated detail. The open-style kitchen adorned with top-of-the-line upscale appliances, a wine/beverage cooler, and a designer brand kitchen faucet with accessories, perfect for culinary enthusiasts and entertainers alike. This home provides infusion of light fills the main living area with the using of skylights and recessed lightings accompany with the white oak floorings. Glass paned stairways with ascent wall leads to lower level to the family/entertainment room. You can enjoy the tranquility of the views from the rear deck. Don't forget about the ample storage at the bottom level. Step outside into the beautifully maintained outdoor area. You will see a harmonious fusion of form and function, the outdoor space is thoughtfully designed to accommodate both intimate gatherings and grand celebrations. Close to Golden Gate Park, Ocean Beach, UCSF, SFSU, Stern Grove, Stonestown Galleria Mall and many more!

Confidential Remarks: This was a 1031 exchange. The property sold in 2022. The seller wanted a longer close to locate their 1031. Seller credited buyer $10,000 for closing cost. County records show 2,400 square feet. According to the floor plan company, the lower level is approx. 1,200+ square feet. (This may be unwarranted square footage and was installed before the current owner).
Public Remarks: You will feel on top of the world inside this tri-level 4 bedroom, 4 bath home (1,210 sq ft. on lower level may not be warranted). From its vantage point in Inner Parkside / Golden Gate Heights this residence overlooks Sunset & Parkside & provides a panorama of the Pacific Ocean & breathtaking sunsets from all levels. An inverted floor plan showcases the sweeping views to best advantage by positioning common area living space on the uppermost level: an open floor plan kitchen, dining area & living room w/fireplace. Sliding glass doors to deck provide stunning views! Down one level, 2 bedrooms stretch across the back of the house & open onto the deck, one a primary en-suite w/ double sinks & stall shower. 3rd bedroom has a sliding glass door out to the lightwell. The lower level opens a world of possibilities; a full bath w/ a shower stall, exercise room, utility room w/ elevated space & storage galore. The lower level opens out to a porch w/stairs leading to a gently sloped backyard.
Showing Instruction: Front gate is unlocked. Supra is located near the front door.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your dream home- this 1936 Spanish Mediterranean center courtyard gem boasts timeless charm and modern comforts. Ascend the stairs to discover a spacious living room adorned with hardwood floors, exposed beams, and a cozy fireplace, offering glimpses of the ocean beyond. Entertain guests in the formal dining room, or enjoy casual meals in the breakfast nook opening to the courtyard. Two generous bedrooms provide ample space, while a vintage kitchen and bathroom exude character and warmth. Venture downstairs to find another bedroom and a newly remodeled bathroom. The laundry room holds a full size washer/dryer, and the sunny yard is perfect for BBQ's. A large garage and parking for one car in the driveway completes the home. Inner Parkside's prime location offers easy access to West Portal Village, Stonestown Mall, and 19th Avenue.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This bright & open 40's home is perched above the Sunset at the base of Golden Gate Heights Park, & close to Irving Street. The house has been thoughtfully updated throughout. Enter a private & secluded stone patio through the front gate. Views of the Pacific greet you as you approach the front door. The kitchen has been smartly designed & tastefully renovated with custom cabinets, a Wolf 6 burner range, Bosch dishwasher & Calacatta Marble counters. The living & dining area feature large, West facing windows to capture a dramatic ocean view. The living room has a fireplace & an attractive wood planked ceiling. There are hardwood floors throughout. There's a split level bedroom & remodeled bath just above the main living space. The downstairs bedrooms are nicely separated providing privacy. One of the bedrooms has a large walk-in closet & handsome built-ins. There's a large deck off of the bedroom level with sweeping views & access to a large, terraced yard. The house has internal garage access, including a stacked washer & dryer. This charming & light filled home is minutes to both the Inner Sunset & West Portal.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perched majestically along Noriega Street in the coveted Golden Gate Heights neighborhood, this stunning three-level detached single-family home offers a rare opportunity to experience San Francisco living at its finest. With captivating vistas of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, the lush greenery of Golden Gate Park, and the glittering Downtown skyline, this property highlights mid century design and panoramic beauty. Watch the city come alive at night or soak in the golden hues of sunrise. This three-level residence is designed for comfortable living with all three bedrooms located on the top floor. The contemporary kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting stainless steel appliances, ample storage, and counter space for culinary creations. The convenience of a side-by-side two-car garage ensures you have plenty of space for your vehicles and storage needs. Enjoy amazing 360 vistas at Grand View Park. Nearby include Inner Sunset, Golden Gate Park and Cole Valley, 19th Ave and Noriega Street shopping. In addition, a selection of highly regarded schools is conveniently located within a short commuting distance.
Confidential Remarks: SupraBox is on side stairs handrail. Escrow is opened with Kathy Ng at WFG Title. Escrow #23-161701. Plans have been submitted for 2 level 24'rearward expansion. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Elevate your lifestyle with this captivating 3-level, 5 bed, 3.5 bath residence on Quintara Street. Marvel at the Bay and GG Bridge views that grace this modern haven. Recently renovated with a fresh touch, this fully detached gem stands as a symbol of city elegance. Step through the doors and be greeted by a masterful interior that seamlessly blends contemporary design with comfort. Skylights invite the outdoors in, illuminating the open living spaces. Enjoy a perfect harmony of indoor and outdoor living with a connecting deck, a serene patio, and lush green spacea haven for relaxation and gatherings. When evenings turn cooler, gather by the inviting fireplace, or take in the beauty of newly installed hardwood floors that exude sophistication. Practicality meets luxury with the convenience of a 1-car garage, catering to your urban needs. Nestled in a tranquil yet convenient neighborhood, this residence provides easy access to picturesque parks, vibrant playgrounds, and efficient transportation options. And with a short stroll, West Portal Village's charming shops await, completing the circle of effortless city living. Your urban sanctuary is ready for youcome make it yours.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Thomas Cree - 510-744-3500 - Welcome to The Inner Sunset District. This wonderful home has been gently lived in for over 30 years as it was the owners' weekend getaway property! Let the feel of the Mediterranean design warm your heart, and a hint of Baroque satisfy your desire for this style of San Francisco living! From the moment you walk through the front door, you are met with gorgeous hardwood flooring that will demand your attention in the main living area upstairs! The spacious formal living room has high ceilings, complete with the original stencil/tole painting art, and a wood burning fireplace! A distant view of the ocean can be seen through the Anderson French style doors that overlook the treelined 18th Ave! Much of the original home is still present in the kitchen and bathrooms. You'll find two spacious bedrooms and one bathroom upstairs, with two bedrooms and one bathroom downstairs. Newer forced air heating throughout, gleaming hardwood floors, new interior and exterior paint, gas stove cooktop and so much more...This is a must see! Call your agent today to schedule a private showing.

Submit proof of funds, Pre-Approval letter and Disclosure Cover page with all offers. (tomcree@sbcglobal.net). Any questions, text/call Tom Cree at 510-853-5737. All offers are due by 12:00 pm on Tuesday, April 18th at 12:00PM. No Public Open House
